name: SCRAB
description:
Description

SCRAB is a chaotic shooter where you exterminate scrabs and destroy their nests to save a space quarry from a total space crab infestation. Made for BrackeysJam 2021.2

Navigate throughout the space quarry and exterminate all scrabs and scrab nests to win. Nests spawn more scrabs, especially when aggravated.  Take your trusted UZI and make sure to periodically reload (you cannot reload while firing).

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • E to open doors
  • R to reload
  • G to use a grenade
  • Q to quit (When prompted)
  • M (Mute music) + N (Mute All)

Credits

Thank you to ibxeno and ab_d for sfx and music

Some sound effects were taken from Zapsplats.com
